redemptionMethod.details: Buy-one-Get-one free movie/non-movie ticket on BookMyShow

rewards.rewardDescription: Buy-one-Get-one free movie/non-movie ticket (up to Rs. 500 off on the second ticket) offer on BookMyShow will be discontinued with effect from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward is discontinued

rewards.rewardDescription: 24*7 complimentary concierge services will be discontinued with effect from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward is discontinued

rewards.rewardDescription: 8 complimentary airport meet & assist services will be discontinued with effect from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward is discontinued

redemptionMethod.details: Domestic airport lounge access based on card spends

rewards.rewardDescription: Complimentary domestic airport lounge access based on MAGNUS Credit Card spends in the previous 3 calendar months. Minimum spend of Rs. 50,000 required. In case of a newly issued card, the minimum spend criteria is waived for the month of issuance followed by the next 3 calendar months.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward condition is effective

newCardCondition.value: minimum spend criteria is waived for the month of issuance followed by the next 3 calendar months

redemptionMethod.details: Complimentary guest visits for domestic lounge

rewards.rewardDescription: 4 complimentary guest visits for domestic lounges per calendar year, effective from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward condition is effective

redemptionMethod.details: Complimentary guest visits for international lounge via Priority Pass

rewards.rewardDescription: 4 complimentary guest visits for international lounges (Priority Pass) per card anniversary year, effective from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which the reward condition is effective
